name: The President's Dog
description:
A small rhythm game (1-2 min.) made for wizard jam 5. The game is based on 'The President's Dog', episode 1 of 'Something True' podcast on the Idle Thumbs network. I was trying to make something similar to the 'Rhythm Heaven' series of games.

Play as president Warren G. Harding's dog, Laddie Boy, and compose one of the letters he wrote to magazines and newspapers at the time of Harding's presidency.

The game is only available for windows. It is controlled using two different inputs, as explained in the application itself. You can use either mouse or keyboard to play.

Update (08-18-2017): In response to feedback from players I have added a timing indicator to make the input timing clearer. My thanks to everyone who played the game so far!
